definition: office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: This year is also the 12th year of the French post office, La Poste, issuing Chinese New Year stamps.
sentences.chinese: 今年也是法國郵政局發行中國新年郵票第12年。

sentences.english: Will you be passing the post office when you're out?
sentences.chinese: 你出去的時辰會不會顛末郵政局？
喬治的父親被任命爲郵政局長。

sentences.english: The State Post Bureau will be subordinate to the Ministry of Transport.
sentences.chinese: 國家郵政局改由交通運輸部管理。

sentences.english: Then, contact the postmaster of that area.
sentences.chinese: 然後，請與該地區的郵政局長。

sentences.english: I asked the postmaster what he would do about this.
sentences.chinese: 於是我問郵政局長這件事將怎麼辦。

sentences.english: There is a sofa in the postoffice.
From a modest counter within the post office, it has now developed into a modern bank housed in tall buildings.
sentences.chinese: 由郵政局裏的一個小櫃檯發展到現代化高樓大廈。

sentences.english: The postmaster was shot dead by the robbers.
sentences.chinese: 那位郵政局長被強盜開槍打死了。

sentences.english: SPB Weather is the most powerful mobile phone weather forecast program.
sentences.chinese: 國家郵政局天氣是最強大的移動電話天氣預報節目。
他的父親被任命爲郵政局長。
他們委任他爲郵政局長。

sentences.english: Hope that province Post Bureau listens to staff and worker's heartfelt wishes definitely to Lin Shui bureau.
sentences.chinese: 望省郵政局一定到鄰水局聽聽職工的心聲。

sentences.english: Her grandfather was a village postmaster.
sentences.chinese: 她祖父曾是一位墟落郵政局長。

sentences.english: John was appointed postmaster vice Richard retired.
sentences.chinese: 約翰被任命爲郵政局長，取代退休的理查德。
喬治的父親被任命爲郵政局長。

definition: to order goods/to place an order
to shut down/to terminate/to cancel/to go out of business
Kai Tak Airport, international airport of Hong Kong from 1925 to 1998
to start using/(computing) to enable (a feature)
Shilin or Shihlin district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
to add to existing facilities or services
